# Anatomy
###### Trails Anatomy

## Tags
```config directory```

## Where am I ?

The config env directory, it contains your custom configuration for each environment you want. 

### Path:

> [testing.js](env.md)

> [development.js](env.md)

> [production.js](env.md)

> [staging.js](env.md)

> [index.js](../../index.md)
